name: Mission Viejo
shortDescription: A master-planned community known for its family-friendly environment, extensive parks, and beautiful lake.
fullDescription: Mission Viejo is one of Southern California‚Äôs largest master-planned communities, offering a suburban lifestyle with abundant parks, recreational facilities, and a vibrant cultural scene. Known for its scenic Lake Mission Viejo, excellent schools, and active community events, the city attracts families and professionals alike. Conveniently located with access to major freeways, residents enjoy proximity to beaches, shopping centers, and employment hubs.
heroImageAlt: Scenic view of Lake Mission Viejo and surrounding neighborhoods

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Hills
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with rolling hills, parks, and residential communities.

neighborhoods.name: Lake Forest
neighborhoods.description: Suburban city with parks, shopping, and business centers.

neighborhoods.name: San Juan Capistrano
neighborhoods.description: Historic city with mission, downtown shopping, and cultural attractions.

highlights.title: Lake Mission Viejo
highlights.description: Private recreational lake with boating, fishing, swimming, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Lake Mission Viejo with boats and shore

highlights.title: Oso Creek Trail
highlights.description: Popular trail for walking, biking, and enjoying nature throughout the city.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Trail and greenery along Oso Creek

highlights.title: Mission Viejo Mall
highlights.description: Shopping center with a variety of retail stores, dining, and entertainment options.

highlights.title: Family Events & Parks
highlights.description: Numerous parks, playgrounds, and community events year-round for families.

faqs.question: Is Mission Viejo good for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mission Viejo is known for its safe neighborhoods, good schools, parks, and family-friendly activities.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are available?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy boating on Lake Mission Viejo, hiking and biking trails, and numerous parks and recreational programs.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Mission Viejo?
faqs.answer: The city is served by highly rated school districts, including Capistrano Unified School District with several top schools.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Mission Viejo?
faqs.answer: Located near the 5 and 241 freeways, the commute to Orange County business centers and beaches is convenient.
